name: Desyn
overview:
We are passionate about creating enticing websites to hold right reflection of your business practices.

Desyn is a Chandigarh based company which was established in early 2011 by Nishant Kalia and Geetanjali Gupta who are driven by passion to deliver high quality work using ethical business practices. Nishant hold 8 years of expert experience as a Designer and Geetanjali is an AIESEC Alumni and was a part of founder team of AIESEC in Jalandhar. Desyn has been instrumental in serving offshore clients for website designing, UI designing and Android designing with record of holding happy clients. As reflected from their website www.desyn.in , their thinking about des(y)n is little twisted to create eye-popping website.

You can also follow Desyn on facebook and twitter to receive updates and informative blogs and links shared time to time. Twitter: http://twitter.com/#!/desynin Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/pages/Desyn/182647328435321

Desyn is also near to launch its print design services for offshore clients to get their print material deisgned and printed at very reasonable rates and high quality prints. For any kind of feedback and service we will appreciate it in an email at info@desyn.in.
